sentences.sContent: The slum must be inside you.
sentences.sCn: 贫民窟一定是在你内心.

sentences.sContent: But, she added, even after she had a classroom, she had no idea what might come of her effort to teach kids from the slum.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, she added, even after she had a classroom, she had no idea what might come of her effort to teach kids from the slum.
sentences.sCn: 但她补充说，即使她有了教室后，她并不知道她对贫民窟的孩子施教会得出什么样的结果。

remMethod.val: 政府准备统计(sum)一下住在贫民窟(slum)的人的数量

trans.tranCn: 贫民窟；陋巷；脏乱的地方
trans.tranOther: a house or an area of a city that is in very bad condition, where very poor people live
